This paper was written as part of the course *Multivariate Time Series* presented by [Zakaria Moussa](https://www.univ-nantes.fr/zakaria-moussa). The aim of the course was to identify an economic problem and answer it using multivariate time series analysis methods, in particular the VAR method.
